channel.title: ~#!Rsc-mutilate!#~ 24/7 Brand new server
channel.description:
Hi people,
I've just released a new server currently running at 20x exp not too hard but not very easy, we have a couple of our own little features such as newly added training area such as smithing and thieving, i've decided only lobsters should be given out by master fisher meaning people who like to fish can sell shark and swordy certs :), we added a closer alter room in edgeville removing the old one and adding this one, we are currently working on a few mini games to be added into the game which are being worked on as we speak we do not sell rune or dragon in store so sorry guys you will have to smith your own rune :P or get your combat up and range kbd for the rare dragon dropsits up 24/7 and at the moment im just waiting on the new .org website to finish pending payment then where all up and ready so im just using a simple and basic forum for now the link is still in sig and i hope you guys enjoy the server heres a couple of screenshots to show you some places.
Newly built alter
[img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/1501/alter.jpg[/img]
New mining area
[img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/6173/mininge.jpg[/img]
New thieving area
[img]http://img142.imageshack.us/img142/2580/thieving.jpg[/img]
Hope you all enjoy server if you come :)

item.description:

You dont really need to leave the negative comments do you? if you don’t like you don’t have to play its not really hard im not forcing anyone im just advertising everyone has there own opinions fair enough your expressing yours but its not really needed is it?

Read full topic
